_header: Worshipful maiden to the world Mary
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘Inuocacio ad beatam Virginem’ — seven stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM744.First Lines:
Worsshipful maiden to the world MarieModir moost louynge vn to al
                    man kynde…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…ffor whom thow preyest god nat list denyeThyn axynge blessid
                    maiden Marie
